A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought it was an intellectual take on the Star Wars universe; however\, if you are not a fan\, I could see how some parts might become boring or confusing. And\, there’s the “kitchen sink” factor where the writers and directors were slamming you with tie-Ins; or\, a pivotal character such as Snoke is killed before we know of him in this Universe. Writing about universes\, man\, they’re becoming confusing.
